javadoc: Class to write files in a project to a jar output stream.

@param jarOut the the jar file output stream the zip entries are
 to be written to.

params.comment:
the the jar file output stream the zip entries are

methods.name: outputFile
methods.comment: Outputs an individual file to the jar.

params.name: jarPath
params.comment:
the base path to prepend to the file as it is written
 to the jar output stream.

return.comment: true if all files are recursively output to the jar file.

name: ProjectJarWriter
